com.radirius.mercury.framework

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.framework.Core
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrameBufferTest, GraphicsTest

    public abstract class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    The Core that will host the game with help from the Runner class.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny, Sri Harsha Chilakapati

        The core's runner.

      • init

        public abstract void init()
        Used to initialize all resources, and for whatever you wish to do for initialization. May run on a seperate thread, while the main Thread continues to the game loop.

      • update

        public abstract void update(float delta)
        Called once every frame and used to handle all game logic.
        Parameters:
        delta - The delta time.

      • render

        public abstract void render(Graphics g)
        Called once every frame and used to render graphics.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object for rendering.

      • cleanup

        public abstract void cleanup()
        Called when the game loop is ended.

      • initDisplay

        public void initDisplay(int width,
                        int height,
                        boolean fullscreen,
                        boolean vsync)
        Initializes the display.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the display.
        height - The height of the display.
        fullscreen - Whether or not fullscreen is enabled.
        vsync - Whether or not v-sync is used.
